name: Taxi Racing Mania: The city speed car race for Cash - Free Edition
name_original: Taxi Racing Mania: The city speed car race for Cash - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR TAXI RACING MANIA : THE CITY SPEED CAR RACE FOR CASH GAME

In New York, price of gas has gone up so as taxi driver you have to work hard to collect money. Go fast and try to avoid crashing with other cars and Collect money on the road. If you have enough money then you can unlock all 3 cars.

Features:
- Cool soundtrack
- Easy to play but difficult to win
- Amazing graphics and effects
- Most addictive and fun game

How to play?
- Drive fast and try to collect money on the road
- Be careful with other cars
- If you collect enough money then you can unlock all 3 cars

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> TAXI RACING MANIA : THE CITY SPEED CAR RACE FOR CASH GAME
